ygData.msgSnippet: You know whats going to be funny..... the people that want to be remved from this list will just delete that email you just sent to tell them how because they
ygData.messageBody:
You know whats going to be funny..... the people that want to be remved from
this list will just delete that email you just sent to tell them how because
they dont want to be on the list anymore.... so they will keep getting the
mail and not be able to get rid of it.. then there mama will beat their ass
for filling up the email server and then their mama's boss will come in and
beat him/her for stressing out his/her mama enough to make her not be able to
conecentrate well so she lost that big account, and then it just so happens
that the it was a government account so the president will come down and kill
his/her whole family but him so then he/she can play EQ all day long with no
interuptions.... but you will still be on the list >>> MUahhahahahaha
